website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for reliable, user-friendly model, the Becooker has features and capabilities that are comparable to top-name competitors.
pros: Boasts 11 functions and a vivid digital timer
Customers love that it comes in 4-quart model that's perfect for singles and couples
cons: Name brand isn't as recognizable as other models on our list, which is minor concern
Doesn't have as many presets or fancy features as others we considered

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in June for my mother. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. It no longer turns on. Too bad Amazon won't let me return it. I've never seen a pressure cooker only last 5 months and my mother barely used it.
customer_reviews.author: Nailet Perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that I used the Becooker for was to cook frozen chicken breasts, we were amazed at how easy it was and how tender the chicken was after 16 minutes. I have used the saute function along with the pressure cooker function. So far so good I will try to update as I use the other functions. Update- today I used the slow cooker function and it was a breeze. The only downside is that I cant see the food cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A Leon

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this pressure cooker at all. I just cooked some chicken for the second time using it and I walked out of my kitchen, and I heard a loud boom and there was boiling water spewing upwards all through my kitchen. Thankfully, no one got injured and Amazon issued a refund. I would be weary that there is a defect. It was completely closed while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of these
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad my daughter talked me into getting this. I have been using it non stop since I got it. It is so easy to use and makes cooking so easy. I can make meals in half or less the time in normally took. This is very well made . It comes with a recipe book with some good recipes. It is easy to clean. Also is a generous size so can cook for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Taxlady

customer_reviews.title: Bad item
customer_reviews.text: I finally re-did my entire kitchen and set up my pressure cooker to prepare dinner only for it not to work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dawonda Childs

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Lid is hard to open and close , not practical to operate. Return for refund
customer_reviews.author: Dl

customer_reviews.title: Rusty pot but Becooker sent me a new one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooker on jul 2019 and just used it for few times. I can’t believe that my pot is already rusty. Is unacceptable that this turns out this way, is not healthy to cook with a rusty pot and this was not cheaper. Hope the company will get in touch with me for this matter! UPDATE: The company got in touched with me and sent me a new cooker! I am looking forward that this time it doesn't get rusty. Thanks for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon costumer

customer_reviews.title: Really like!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times and most recipes I've tried have turned out well with the pressure cooker mode. Just make sure you have enough liquid in there or your stuff will stick to the bottom of the pot. Love the slow cook mode. Frozen things are even done in 4 hrs. Saute is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Brinkmann

customer_reviews.title: The stainless steel pot is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pressure cooker several times in the past week. I love the stainless steel pot. The others I've purchased in the past had the non stick pot and pieces of the pot pealed off after using it and ended up in my food which is why I was so happy to find this one! It cleans so easily and is easy to use. The only thing I miss is not having a guide to tell how long to cook veggies and other items...other than that the function is 5 star!!
customer_reviews.author: Motowner

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Pot stopped working in less than 5 months😕
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pot as a gift for my grandmother. She used it a few times and loved it. Imagine our surprise when it simply stopped working about four and a half months later - and on Christmas day no less! My family had to unpack the ingredients from the pot and cook the meal with a traditional pressure pot. We tried calling customer service for days afterwards-- getting no response or help whatsoever. Don't know how they managed to get so many good reviews for this product. It was a fail. Save money and energy and select something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kady E.

customer_reviews.title: ok.  Couldnt get things to cook quite right
customer_reviews.text: Gets hot and has lots of options, but the buttons are not intuitive, and i lost the guide book. When I cooked rice it burnt the rice on on the bottom every time. I guess you get what you pay for I will get a better quality product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Laurenad2005

customer_reviews.title: Daughter approved. Dad satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my very particular daughter's. They were ecstatic, both have used them and said these had all the features anyone would need. I'm happy because I didnt waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not efficiency
customer_reviews.text: Not Efficiency: When you choose the function, I was confused about the time because it won’t start to timer until the pot is heat up.
customer_reviews.author: HiuChing C

customer_reviews.title: super economy pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: Bought for model electric pressure cooker well liked. Important when pressure all turns, program making are launched. Price economy cheaper brand. We must also reserve order. Long Service. Seller sociable, extended protection buyer immediately after treatment. But not required, my model fits all, as a native things work.
customer_reviews.author: Anods

customer_reviews.title: Cook fast
customer_reviews.text: First time using pressure Pot. Before I cook rice, I read few of helpful reviews and videos on Amazon. Then I follow steps. I make it !!! My rice very soft and smell good. It’s cook very fast!! Love it soooo much.
customer_reviews.author: Ying C.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She loves it. Cooks fast and can be used for many things. She lives in a small apt so she can't have many pots. Although this is big, she made room for it by getting rid of some things. Easy to clean also. What I didn't like is the way it was delivered. Left out in the rain and the box that it came in fell apart. Should have been put under the eave of the house.
customer_reviews.author: joan villegas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I got the 4 qt cause it's just my husband, my 2 year old and me. It's perfect and makes food taste so good! It programmable and easy to use. There is so many pressure cookers to choose from and I'm so glad I picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with  this Cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Wonder Multifunction Pot Just what I was looking for. Easy to use and cook food in a timely. However it's bulky for my small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: kellybelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First time cooking with a pressure cooker. We made pulled chicken, baked potatoes and beef stew. Everything came out great. I'm giving an overall rating of 4 stars for now because I had to request a replacement. Customer service was quick to respond and send a replacement. So nice to just set it, go about your day, and finish the day off with a delicious home cooked meal waiting for you.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth m bulmer

customer_reviews.title: Second chance
customer_reviews.text: *Updated review* I initially returned the product cause it stopped working the second time used, however I thought I would give it a second chance and so I replaced it with same product and it works perfect! It's such a time saver and I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to give.
customer_reviews.text: Is a Christmas gift for my son, he is very excited to use it. I brought it based on the excellent reviews and the extra options it has. His first dish is going to be chicken noodle soup.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: BeCooker
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that what was pictured on Amazon and also picture on box when received was not the same as actually IN the box.
customer_reviews.author: firedragon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pressure cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love it for cooking dinner, hard boiled eggs & much much more. The reviews were better for this brand than the Instant Pot brand & still glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The third time I used this it stopped working and won't turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Swallow

customer_reviews.title: Worked one time
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first time. Second use plugged it in and it smelled like an electrical fire. Unplugged it, plugged it back in and it was not working anymore. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product. It's broken. Will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.text: Had it one month used it twice and now it doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Toy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good taste with quick cooking
customer_reviews.text: After cooked by this, meat and potatoes become soft and taste delicious. The cooking is also fast and half an hour is fairly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions on how to use very poor.
customer_reviews.text: Can't figue out how to use the features. Need better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Westberg

customer_reviews.title: Problems with months
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 5 times over 8 months. During the 5th use it stopped heating.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ropp

customer_reviews.title: With frozen meat you will have to add more time.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, have not tried all the features as of yet . Will keep you posted
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Needs instructions and would be great
customer_reviews.text: I never used anything like this before so I had no idea how to use it. There are no instructions!! I had to use YouTube videos. Also it takes 20 minutes or more to preheat. I don’t know if that’s average as far as these pots go. I don’t know if your supposed to have the food inside while it’s preheating. The first time I didn’t know it would take so long and then it cooked for 30 minutes and burned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: The Becooker insta-pot is a great improvement over the pressure cookers I remember as a child. Very nice looking, easy to clean, and the 4 quart size is perfect for preparing meals for 2. I gave it 4 stars because the written directions could have been clearer. There were poorly worded instructions, misspelled words, and things that could have been better explained. The pot that is pictured in the instructions is not the pot that I purchased. This lead to a bit of confusion. Overall, I am, so far, pleased with the Becooker.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet D

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find accessories for the 4 qt model...
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday, cooked my first meal tonight and it turned out great. The 4 qt size is perfect as it is just my husband and I, however my one complaint is that apparently this is the only company that makes a 4 qt model and it has been almost impossible to find accessories for it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Bitthday surprise.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t care for is the valve steam release, I use a long handled wooden spoon. I love mine so much I ordered one for my girlfriends birthday. It’s easy to clean once it cools down, and I’m sure the same with a bbq recipe. Can hardly wait to see her face when she opens it up.
customer_reviews.author: Connemara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Use it a lot. Love it. Could use a much better instruction manual . The very small cook book is not well written for US.
customer_reviews.author: chrispy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 Months!
customer_reviews.text: This product had little to no instructions for basic tasks such as cooking rice. I purchased it 3 months ago and it is already non-functional. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money for an Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Ta

customer_reviews.title: Performs well!
customer_reviews.text: This was a steal for the 6 quart cooker I only paid $24. It performed very well. I would have liked to see better instructions. But if you can get it for such a low price, it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: reeweegee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is a great value at this price point. This is my 2nd pressure cooker. I wanted one with larger capacity and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pot.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once so far. It worked well for making bean soup with dried beans.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very good service
customer_reviews.text: The seller renyushop are very good at their service. I contacted them about the problem and they replied quickly. They replaced the slow cooker and it is very useful and works excellently
customer_reviews.author: GIHAN TAHA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Cooking with this makes life so much better. It’s easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Payette

customer_reviews.title: My first pressure cooker!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, and so fast! Within 15 mins I have a meal, the instruction is also very easy to understand, highly recommended for a busy mom wanting a fast healthy and delicious meal!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Need more recipes
customer_reviews.text: Did not have enough recipes to my liking. Weary of pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after less than 10 uses. When it worked, it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Customer1305

product_meta.title: Becooker Electric Pressure Cooker | 5-in-1 Multi Function | Slow Cooker |Stainless Steel Pot | Pressure Cooker | 4 Quart
product_meta.description:
Size:4 Quart| Color:Black

Becooker Multi Cooker is an indispensable kitchen accessory. Cooking with it helps you to prepare delicious food easily in less time and with less energy. 

It is used as a rice cooker, slow cooker, pressure cooker. With it you can make a perfectly fluffy rice, incredibly tender meat, steams food such broccoli, carrots, and potatoes.

Great for risottos and pilafs. Manage your food preparing with 11 different programs. Our pot cooker is efficient, versatile and safe.

With a cooker you can make:

 * Rice 
 * Beans
 * Corn
 * Potato
 * Broccoli
 * Carrot
 * Beef
 * Fish
 * Shrimps

Actually you can cook almost everything in our cooker, just choose correct program and enjoy your tasty food!

Cook faster than usual

With our 4 quart electric pressure cooker you can cook 70% faster than usual. And if sometimes cooking can be a boring activity, now you can forget about spending hours and hours on your kitchen. 

Just turn on your multi cooker, and it will make the most delicious meal for you. 

Useful recipes for multi cooker:

COOKED CORN – You can cook a corn in a multi cooker much faster than conventional cooking. Steaming the corn under pressure means that the flavor stays in the kernels, not the cooking water.

FRIED SHRIMP – Seafood is very popular, almost everyone loves it. Now you can cook shrimps easily at home in a pot cooker and get it tender, juicy and well-flavored.

BAKED BREAD – Cook a delicious, soft and spongy bread in a slow cooker.

STEWED BEEF – With a pressure cooker you can have a stewed beef on the table in less than an hour instead of the typical 2-3 hours.

ORDER NOW AND ENJOY DELICIOUS MEALS!
feature_bullets: 5-in-1 Multi Cooker – We offer 11 pressure cook settings that you can use for cooking your favorite recipes. You can pressure cook, slow cook, steam, reduce, sauté and sear without any efforts. Using our pot cooker you can make easily rice, corn, meat, seafood etc.

Easy in use – Just put all necessary ingredients, choose the program and push the button. All other work slow cooker will do for you. It's very convenient for busy man and business women who don’t have a lot of free time.

Pressure cooking – With our multi cooker you can adjust the pressure the way you need. Using customized 5-stage pressure system (0-70 Kpa) makes cooking easy for you. Food would be more tasty and healthy. Cook easily and enjoy delicious meals.

Comfy design – Electric pressure cooker is equipped with removable lid seal ring, removable exhaust valve, and a non-stick stainless steel inner tank. You can clean it easily with a water and soap. Black color of cooker will fit any kitchen design.
[HUMANITY Design, EASY CLEANING]: Removable lid seal ring, removable exhaust valve, and a non-stick stainless steel inner tank. Our multi-use cooker can help you to reduce overall cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars168 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
